title: Cosmopolitan Champagne Cocktail
directions: Stir together Cointreau, juices, and sugar and chill, covered, 2 to 6 hours. Just before serving, divide among 10 Champagne flutes and top off with Champagne.
ingredients: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice
4 cups chilled Champagne or other sparkling wine
